MENU_SP_DESC_SO_SURVIVAL_ARMORY: Browse items in Survival armories and their unlock status.
MENU_SP_DESC_SPECIALOPS: Playing solo or co-op, rank up to unlock weapons, tactical support, levels and more in Survival mode and a variety of challenging missions.
MENU_SP_FIRST_DIFFICULTY_STAR_SURVIVAL: Survive higher waves in this Op to earn additional stars.
CHALLENGE_UNSTOPPABLE_DESC: Survive 15 waves in each mission of Special Ops Survival mode.
CHALLENGE_DESC_UNSTOPPABLE: Survive 15 waves in all Special Ops Survival levels.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_PARK_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_ITALY_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_OVERWATCH_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_MORNINGWOOD_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_METEORA_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_CEMENT_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Juggernauts.

SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_NOLA_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SO_SURVIVAL_CHAOS_DOME_DESC: Survival of the fittest!  Enemies are coming from everywhere.
SO_SURVIVAL_CHAOS_PARIS_DESC: Attempt to survive relentless attacks from enemies in the streets of Paris.
SO_SURVIVAL_CHAOS_VILLAGE_DESC: Battle through an onslaught of enemies in the village.
SO_SURVIVAL_CHAOS_UNDERGROUND_DESC: Fight through the trainyard as enemies attempt to stop you.
SO_SURVIVAL_AIRSUPPORT_RIOT_DESC: Riot Shield allies dropped in via chopper.
SO_SURVIVAL_PARTNER_READY:
Teammate ready
Press ^3[{skip}]^7 to ready up: &&1
SO_SURVIVAL_AIRSUPPORT_AIRSTRIKE_DESC: Precision Air Strike on selected location.
SO_SURVIVAL_ARMORY_AIRSUPPORT_DESC: Call in Predator missiles, Friendly support and Perk air drops.
SO_SURVIVAL_AMMO_REFILL_DESC: Refills ammo for your primary weapons.
SO_SURVIVAL_ARMORY_EQUIPMENT_SENTRY_GROU: Mini-gun mounted sentry and grenade launchers.
SO_SURVIVAL_CHAOS_BONUS_FREEZE_METER: Press [{+activate}] For Bonus Pickup: Freeze Meter
SO_SURVIVAL_AIRSUPPORT_DELTA_DESC: Delta Force allies dropped in via chopper.
SO_SURVIVAL_ARMORY_EQUIPMENT_EXP_GROUP_D: Frag grenades, Flashbangs, Claymores and C4s.
SO_SURVIVAL_ARMORY_EQUIPMENT_DESC: Purchase Explosives, Sentries, Armor and more...
SO_SURVIVAL_REPLACE_WEAPON_WARNING: Buying this will replace your current weapon.
SO_SURVIVAL_SUR_CH_STREAK_DESC: Get 4 kills while not taking damage.
SO_SURVIVAL_SUR_CH_EXECUTION_DESC: Get 4 Executions in a round by killing dying enemies.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_LAST_STAND: Self Revive allows you to pick yourself up by killing an enemy. Can be restocked in the Equipment Armory.
SO_SURVIVAL_ARMORY_EQUIPMENT_DEF_GROUP_D: Body Armor, Riot Shield and Self Revive.
SO_SURVIVAL_EQUIPMENT_LASTSTAND_DESC: When knocked down, shoot your way back up.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_STAR_RANKINGS: Survival to wave 5 for 1 star, wave 10 for 2 stars and wave 20 for 3 stars.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_AMMO_REFILL: "Refill Bullet Ammo" in Weapon Armory refills all weapons carried.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_BUY_NEW_WEAPON: When you go to refill ammo, consider buying a new weapon as it comes with full stock and clip.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_ATTACHMENT: Your weapon may have available attachments, shop for upgrades at the Weapon Armory.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_WAVE_BONUS: Headshots, accuracy, damage taken and time all contribute to your Wave Bonus.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_CHALLENGE_REWARD: Completing a mini-challenge more than once in a wave will increase its reward.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_RIOT_SHIELD_DAMAGE: Riot Shield will break when damaged enough, but it will still provide some protection.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_ARMOR_RESTOCK: Body Armor provides damage protection. You can restock it in the Equipment Armory when it runs out.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_FRIENDLY_RIOTSHIEL: Friendly Riot Shield support can also benefit you if they drop their Riot Shield in combat.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_ARMORY_UNLOCK: Check Armories for new unlocks as you rank up.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_SENTRY_UNATTENDED: If you leave your Auto Turrets unattended, enemies will be more likely to pursue them.
DEADQUOTE_SO_SURVIVAL_KILL_CHEMICAL_ENEM: It is beneficial to kill a chemical gas enemy while they are near other enemies.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_DOME_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_CARBON_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_VILLAGE_DESC: Bomb Squads, Attack Dogs, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_SEATOWN_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_RADAR_DESC: Bomb Squads, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_PARIS_DESC: Bomb Squads, Attack Dogs, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_ALPHA_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Armored Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_BRAVO_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_PLAZA2_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Armored Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_MOGADISHU_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Armored Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_EXCHANGE_DESC: Bomb Squads, Chemical Warfare, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Armored Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_UNDERGROUND_DESC: Bomb Squads, Attack Dogs, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_HARDHAT_DESC: Bomb Squads, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_BOOTLEG_DESC: Bomb Squads, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_LAMBETH_DESC: Bomb Squads, Claymore Experts, Choppers & Riotshield Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_SURVIVAL_INTERCHANGE_DESC: Bomb Squads, Attack Dogs, Choppers & Juggernauts.
SPECIAL_OPS_FAILURE_HINT_TIME:
You ran out of time.
Keep an eye on the clock.
SPECIAL_OPS_ESCAPE_WARNING: Turn back and continue the mission!
SPECIAL_OPS_ESCAPE_MESSAGE: Traitor. You have abandoned the mission.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_HIDDEN_SO_GHILLIES_DESC: Evade enemy patrols and Ghillie Snipers near Chernobyl.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_AC130_CO_HUNTED_DESC: Rain death from above using an AC-130 gunship to protect your partner.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_AC130_CO_HUNTED_OBJ_DESC:
Reach the Farm House basement.
Reach the western edge of the Workshops.
Reach the Barn near the Greenhouses.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_CHOPPER_INVASION_DESC: Explosive ammunition, Vulcan Minigun, Blackhawk Helicopter.  Clear the way.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_FAVELA_DESC: Hunt down and eliminate the Favela gang.  Minimize civilian casualties.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_DES: Speed your snowmobile down the mountain, dodging trees, rocks and thousand foot drops.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ:
Finish in 2 minutes.
Finish in 90 seconds.
Finish in 70 seconds.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DEFUSE_FAVELA_ESCAPE_DESC: Race through the Favela marketplace defusing the explosives before its too late.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_FOREST_CONTINGENCY_DESC: Use silenced sniper rifles and cunning to slip past the enemy patrols.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_DESC: Rack up a large enough body count.  Quick kills earn larger bonuses.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ASSAULT_OILRIG_DESC: Breach and clear two deadly rooms full of enemies and hostages to capture the oil rig.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_DESC: Use C4, grenade launchers, RPGs, sentry guns, semtex and more to destroy every vehicle on the bridge.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_DESC: Sabotage the remote airbase with your silenced weapons and heartbeat sensor.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SHOWERS_GULAG_DESC: Smash through enemy defenses in the Gulag and escape.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_TAKEOVER_OILRIG_DESC:
Kill all fifteen Juggernauts on the oil rig.
This probably isn't even possible.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_SNOWRACE2_CLIFFHANGER_DES: Launch your snowmobile across the chasm before time runs out.  Hit the flag gates to get extra time.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_INTEL_BONEYARD_DESC: Battle Shadow Company and Juggernauts in the airplane graveyard.  Grab the intel and escape to the extraction point.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ESCAPE_AIRPORT_DESC: Pummel your way through enemy riot shield ambushes.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DESC: Clear all of the enemy targets as fast as possible. Shooting civilians will prevent you from getting 3 stars.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_OBJ_DES:
Clear the course.
Clear in 45 seconds.
Clear in 35 seconds.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_JUGGERNAUTS_FAVELA_DESC: Kill all ten Juggernauts using only explosives and a knife.  You'd be insane to even try this.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_CROSSING_SO_BRIDGE_DESC: Push through the invading forces on the bridge to reach the safe zone.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DEFENSE_INVASION_DESC: Sentry guns, Thermal sights, Rocket launchers and Claymores.  Defend yourself from five difficult waves of attackers.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_DESC: Use sniper rifles, claymores and Predator Drones to hold off waves of enemies.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DESC: Laze targets for the Stryker armored vehicle.  Battle in the 'burbs house to house, room to room.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_TAKEOVER_ESTATE_DESC: Eliminate Ghillie Snipers, Elite Mercenaries and Juggernauts guarding the estate.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ALPHA_DESC: Predator Drones, favela gangs, sniper rifles and stealth.  These Ops are short and sweet.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_BETA_DESC: AC-130 gunships, snowmobile races, and Vulcan miniguns with explosive ammo.  Something for everyone.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_CHARLIE_DESC: Time trials, explosive breaches, boneyards and enemies in Ghillie Suits.  Things are getting a bit tougher.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_DELTA_DESC: Blizzards, airports, estates and bridges.  Five challenging Ops.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ECHO_DESC: An oil rig and a favela full of Juggernauts.  These Ops are fast and brutal.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_KILLSPREE_FAVELA_OBJ_DESC:
30 Enemies, 6 Civilian casualties maximum.
40 Enemies and Dogs, 4 Civilian casualties.
50 Enemies and Dogs, 3 Civilian casualties.
SPECIAL_OPS_SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_D:
3 Waves of infantry, 1 Jeep and 1 Truck.
4 Waves of infantry, 2 Jeeps and 1 Truck.
5 Waves of infantry, 3 Jeeps and 2 Trucks.
PERKS_DESC_BOMB_SQUAD: Detect enemy explosives and tactical equipment.
PERKS_DESC_IRON_LUNGS: Identify enemy targets at longer range.
PERKS_DIRECTIONAL_ANTIPERSONNEL: Directional anti-personnel mine, set off by an enemy entering its proximity.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_WITH_A: Semi-automatic with a high capacity.  Effective at close range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_WITH_MEDIUM: Semi-automatic with medium capacity and power.  Effective at close range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_WITH_MEDIUM1: Semi-automatic with medium capacity and power.  Effective at close range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_WITH_HIGH: Semi-automatic with high power.  Effective at close range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH: Fully automatic with good accuracy.  Effective at close to medium range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH1: Fully automatic with a high rate of fire.  Effective at close range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH2: Fully automatic with a high rate of fire.  Effective at close to medium range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH3: Fully automatic with high power.  Effective at close to medium range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH4: Fully automatic with a high capacity.  Effective at close to medium range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH5: Fully automatic with high power.  Effective at medium range.
PERKS_SINGLEFIRE_WITH_HIGH: Single-fire with high power.  Effective at medium to long range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH6: Fully automatic with good accuracy.  Effective at medium range.
PERKS_SINGLEFIRE_WITH_A_HIGH: Single-fire with a high capacity.  Effective at medium to long range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH7: Fully automatic with a high rate of fire.  Effective at medium range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_WITH_THREE: Semi-automatic with three round burst fire.  Effective at medium to long range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH8: Fully automatic with low recoil.  Effective at medium range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_SNIPER: Semi-automatic sniper rifle.  Effective at long range.
PERKS_BOLTACTION_SNIPER_RIFLE: Bolt-action sniper rifle.  Effective at long range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_SNIPER1: Semi-automatic sniper rifle.  Effective at long range.
PERKS_BOLTACTION_SNIPER_RIFLE1: Bolt-action sniper rifle.  Effective at long range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_SNIPER2: Semi-automatic sniper rifle.  Effective at long range.
PERKS_SEMIAUTOMATIC_COMBAT: Semi-automatic combat shotgun.  Effective at close range.
PERKS_PUMP_ACTION_SHOTGUN_EFFECTIVE: Pump action shotgun.  Effective at close range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH9: Fully automatic with good power and quick fire rate.  Effective at medium to long range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH10: Fully automatic with a high rate of fire.  Effective at medium to long range.
PERKS_FULLY_AUTOMATIC_WITH11: Fully automatic with high power.  Effective at medium to long range.
PERKS_CHARGE_OF_PLASTIC_EXPLOSIVES: Charge of plastic explosives, set off manually with a detonator.
PERKS_ABILITY_TO_SEEK_OUT_ENEMY: Detect enemy explosives and tactical insertions.
PERKS_DROP_A_LIVE_GRENADE_WHEN: Drop a live grenade just after dying.
PERKS_DESC_CREATE_A_STREAK_REWARDS: Create and customize your Assault and Support Strike Packages.
PERKS_DESC_SPECIALIST_STRIKE_PACKAGE: Create and customize your Specialist Strike Package.
PERKS_BLACK_AND_WHITE_MARPAT: Black and white marpat camouflage finish.
PERKS_COMPLETE_THE_MARKSMAN: Complete the Marksman challenge for this weapon.
PERKS_COMPLETE_THE_EXPERT_CHALLENGE: Complete the Expert challenge for this weapon.
PERKS_UNLOCK_EVERYTHING_IN: Complete all challenges for every weapon in this weapon category.
PERKS_ALL_PLAY_AND_NO_WORK: All play and no work makes Jack a dull boy...
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV5: Unlocked at Private First Class I (Lv5).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV6: Unlocked at Private First Class II (Lv6).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV21: Unlocked at Sergeant First Class I (Lv21).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV22: Unlocked at Sergeant First Class II (Lv22).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV23: Unlocked at Sergeant First Class III (Lv23).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV37: Unlocked at Command Sergeant Major I (Lv37).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV38: Unlocked at Command Sergeant Major II (Lv38).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV39: Unlocked at Command Sergeant Major III (Lv39).
PERKS_AA12: A low recoil fully automatic combat shotgun. Effective at close range.
PERKS_MAGNUM_REVOLVER: .44 Magnum revolver with a six-round cylinder.
PERKS_DEVICE_THAT_DISABLES: Device that disables enemy electronics temporarily.
PERKS_DESC_FINALSTAND: Get back up after being wounded.
PERKS_DOUBLEBARREL_DESC: Double barrel sawed-off shotgun.  Each barrel fires independently.  Very effective at close range.
PERKS_DESC_SHELLSHOCK: A riot shield on your back.
PERKS_UPGRADE_QUICKDRAW: +Recover from equipment and grenade usage quicker.
PERKS_DESC_STINGER: A portable homing surface to air missile.
PERKS_GLOCK: Fully automatic with fast fire rate. Effective at close range.
PERKS_UPGRADE_HARDLINE: +Every two assists counts as a kill towards your killstreak. Deathstreaks require 1 less death.
PERKS_DESC_CAREPACKAGE: Get a Care Package when you spawn.
PERKS_DESC_KNIFETHROW: Throw it and pick it back up.
PERKS_DESC_IMPROVEDEXTRABREATH: Even longer breath for steadier sniper shots.
PERKS_DESC_SHARPSHOOTER: Play as the Scout Sniper Class.
PERKS_DESC_CROWD_CONTROL: Play as the Riot Control Class.
PERKS_DESC_CREATE_A_CLASS: Create and customize your own character classes.
PERKS_DESC_CHALLENGES: Complete Challenges to gain experience and unlock a variety of items.
PERKS_DESC_SPAS12: A semi-automatic combat shotgun. Effective at close range.
PERKS_DESC_GHILLIE_ARCTIC: You will now be camouflaged when sniping in snowy environments.
PERKS_DESC_GHILLIE_DESERT: You will now be camouflaged when sniping in desert environments.
PERKS_DESC_GHILLIE_URBAN: You will now be camouflaged when sniping in urban environments.
PERKS_DESC_BOUNCINGBETTY: Launches into the air before detonating.
PERKS_DESC_JUICED: Move faster for a few seconds after spawning.
PERKS_DESC_ASSAULT: Your streak count resets upon death.  Rewards punish the other team.
PERKS_DESC_SUPPORT: Your streak count persists through death.  Rewards support your team.
PERKS_DESC_SPECIALIST: Earn extra perks through your streak.  The streak and rewards reset upon death.
PERKS_DESC_TROPHY: Active defense turret that destroys two enemy projectiles.
PERKS_DESC_SCRAMBLER_ITEM: A deployable that jams enemy radar based on proximity.
PERKS_DESC_PORTABLE_RADAR_ITEM: A deployable that detects enemies based on proximity.
PERKS_DESC_DEADSILENCE: Move quietly. Reduce the effects of Recon.
PERKS_DESC_AUTOSPOT: Auto spot enemies within your scope.
PERKS_DESC_REVENGE: You'll see the position of the last enemy that killed you.
PERKS_DESC_UAV: Get a UAV when you spawn.
PERKS_DESC_BLINDEYE: Undetectable by air support and sentries.
PERKS_UPGRADE_BLINDEYE: +Launchers lock-on quicker. Extra bullet damage versus air support and sentries.
PERKS_DESC_ASSASSIN: Undetectable by UAV, portable radar, thermal, and heartbeat sensors.
PERKS_UPGRADE_ASSASSIN: +Immune to CUAV and EMP. No red crosshair or name when targeted.
PERKS_DESC_PAINT: Explosive damage paints the target on the mini-map.
PERKS_UPGRADE_PAINT: +Bullet damage paints the target on the mini-map.
PERKS_DESC_DEEP_IMPACT: Bullets carry more damage through materials.
PERKS_DESC_BLING: Two attachments can be added to a weapon.
PERKS_DESC_HOLDBREATHWHILEADS: Hold breath while aiming down the sights.
PERKS_DESC_REDUCEDSWAY: Reduced weapon sway while aiming down the sights.
PERKS_DESC_LIGHTWEIGHT: Increased movement speed when using this weapon.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_OBJ_MAIN: Clear all of the enemy targets as fast as possible.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_HINT2:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Mastering pistols can save you time.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_HINT1:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
To get 3 stars you must reach the end in 35 seconds.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_HINT3:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Try lining up multiple targets and take them all down with a single bullet.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_HINT4:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Sprint as much as possible to get through the course quickly.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_FRIENDLIE: You shot 5 friendly targets. Avoid shooting the civilian targets if you want to finish the course.
You hit too many friendly targets.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_MISSED1: Try to shoot all of the enemy targets.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_MISSED_HA: You must shoot all of the enemy targets before you can continue to the end of the course.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_HINT5:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
If you shoot a civilian target you will not be able to get all 3 stars.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_SCOREBOARD_TIMETOBE: Time to beat for more stars
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_SCOREBOARD_CIVS_KIL: Avoid civilian hits for more stars
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_MISSED_EN: You must shoot all of the enemy targets in order to successfully complete the course.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_DEADQUOTE_TIMEOUT: You must finish within five minutes to successfully complete the course.
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_HINT_MISSED_TARGET_: Missed a Target - Go Back Before Jumping
SO_KILLSPREE_TRAINER_HINT_MISSED_TARGETS: Missed Targets - Go Back Before Jumping
SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_DRONE_PICKUP: Press and hold^3 &&1 ^7to pickup Predator Drone control rig
SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_HARDENED: Fend off four waves of enemy reinforcements.
SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_VETERAN: Fend off five waves of enemy reinforcements.
SO_ROOFTOP_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_REGULAR: Fend off three waves of enemy reinforcements.
SO_KILLSPREE_FAVELA_MISSION_FAILED_LEAVI: You have left your assignment, mission failed.
Warning! You are leaving the mission area.
SO_KILLSPREE_FAVELA_DONT_HARM_CIVILIAN_F: Final warning! Do not harm civilians.
SO_FOREST_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_HARDENED: Evade the patrols and reach the safety of the village.
SO_FOREST_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_REGULAR: Evade the patrols and reach the safety of the village.
SO_FOREST_CONTINGENCY_OBJ_VETERAN: Evade the patrols and reach the safety of the village.
CO_HUNTED_OBJ_CROSS_BRIDGE: Cross the bridge to safety before it is destroyed.
CO_HUNTED_HINT_LASER: Press ^3[{+actionslot 4}]^7 to toggle laser targeting device.
SO_AC130_CO_HUNTED_TIMER_EXPIRED_SPECOP: Mission failed. You ran out of time.
CO_HUNTED_TIMER_EXPIRED: Mission failed. Enemy destroyed the bridge.
AC130_OBJECTIVE_SUPPORT_FRIENDLIES: Provide AC-130 air support for friendly SAS ground units.
AC130_DO_NOT_ENGAGE: You have not been cleared to fire. Mission failed.

AC130_CIVILIAN_FIRE: You harmed a civilian! Mission failed.
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT1:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
 The more enemies you kill in a row, the larger combo bonus you get.
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT2:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
 Downed enemies are worth less points unless you knife them.
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT4:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
 BTR80s will steal your kill if they get the killing shot. Take them out!
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_OBJ_VETERAN: Rack up 30,000 points. Quick kills earn bonus points.
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_OBJ_REGULAR: Rack up 30,000 points. Quick kills earn bonus points.
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_OBJ_HARDENED: Rack up 30,000 points. Quick kills earn bonus points.
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT3:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
 Find clever ways to kill lots of enemies quickly and seek high value targets.
SO_KILLSPREE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT5:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
 In order for a kill to count, you have to give the killing blow.
SO_DEFUSE_FAVELA_ESCAPE_OBJ_BOMB_MARKET: Defuse explosives in the favela market.
SO_DEFUSE_FAVELA_ESCAPE_OBJ_BOMB_APARTME: Defuse explosives in a favela apartment.
SO_DEFUSE_FAVELA_ESCAPE_OBJ_BOMB_STORE: Defuse explosives at the favela store.
SO_DEFUSE_FAVELA_ESCAPE_MISSION_FAILED_C: Civilian casualties are not acceptable. Check your fire!
SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_REGULAR: Reach the Safe House in 3 minutes.
SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_HARDENED: Reach the Safe House in 2 minutes.
SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_VETERAN: Reach the Safe House in 1:30 minutes.
SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_FINISHLINE_: Race to the finish line. Cross the flag gates for extra time.
SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_EASY: Reach the Safe House in 4 minutes.
SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_COOPFAIL_HINT1: Cooperative time trial! Take different paths from your friend to hit all the flag gates.
SO_SNOWRACE1_CLIFFHANGER_SCOREBOARD_TIME: Time to beat for more stars
SO_CHOPPER_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT2: Communication is essential, use landmarks to describe the locations of the enemy.
SO_CHOPPER_INVASION_HINT_ADS_SLOWDOWN: Press and hold ^3[{+activate}]^7 to slow down the Helicopter's speed.
SO_CHOPPER_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT1: The chopper gunner needs to provide cover for the ground force.
SO_CHOPPER_INVASION_OBJ_REGULAR: Link up with your partner at the extraction point.
SO_HIDDEN_SO_GHILLIES_OBJ_VETERAN: Reach the extraction point. Be patient and stealthy.
SO_HIDDEN_SO_GHILLIES_HINT_TIME: Press up on the dpad to see your Time and Kills.
SO_HIDDEN_SO_GHILLIES_OBJ_HARDENED: Reach the extraction point. Be patient and stealthy.
SO_HIDDEN_SO_GHILLIES_OBJ_REGULAR: Reach the extraction point. Be patient and stealthy.
SO_DEFENSE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT2:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Stick the side of a BTR with a Semtex grenade ^3[{+smoke}]^7 to destroy it.
SO_DEFENSE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT4:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Predator Drone kills enemies as easily as it will you.
SO_DEFENSE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT1:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Helicopters are vulnerable to small arms fire or one good hit from a rocket or grenade launcher.
SO_DEFENSE_INVASION_DEADQUOTE_HINT3:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
In order to build the best defense, you may need to search for weapons and sentry turrets elsewhere.
SO_INTEL_BONEYARD_OBJ_EASY: Retrieve enemy intel from the airplane graveyard and extract.
SO_INTEL_BONEYARD_OBJ_REGULAR: Retrieve enemy intel from the airplane graveyard and extract.
SO_INTEL_BONEYARD_OBJ_HARDENED: Retrieve enemy intel from the airplane graveyard and extract.
SO_INTEL_BONEYARD_OBJ_VETERAN: Retrieve enemy intel from the airplane graveyard and extract.
ESTATE_LEARN_PRONE_HOLDDOWN: Press and hold down^3 [{+prone}] ^7to evade the landmine!
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_LASER_HINT1: Press^3 [{+actionslot 4}] ^7to laze a target for the Stryker.
ESTATE_DSM_PICKUP_HINT: Press and hold ^3&&1^7 to retrieve the DSM.
ESTATE_DSM_USE_HINT: Press and hold ^3&&1^7 to connect the DSM to Makarov's computer.
ESTATE_DSM_DESTROYED_BY_PLAYER: Watch your fire! You destroyed the DSM.
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DOWNLOAD_STOPPED: The DSM was disconnected from the computer by the enemy.
ESTATE_REMIND_PRONE_LINE2: Press and hold ^3[{+stance}]^7 to evade them.
SENTRY_MOVE: Press and hold ^3&&1^7 to move the turret.
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DEADQUOTE_HINT1:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Keep enemies away from the DSM while it's downloading!
If they interrupt it you will have to restart the download.
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DEADQUOTE_HINT3:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Press ^3[{+actionslot 4}]^7 to activate your targeting laser, then ^3[{+attack}]^7 to order the Stryker to suppress that target.
ESTATE_REMIND_PRONE_LINE2_HOLDDOWN: Press and hold down ^3[{+prone}]^7 to evade them.
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_OBJ_EXTRACT: Return to the Stryker for extraction.
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DSM_USE_HINT: Press and hold ^3&&1^7 to start the download.
ESTATE_DSM_DESTROYED_BY_AI_GUNFIRE: The enemy shot up and destroyed the DSM.
ESTATE_OBJ_EXFIL: Get to the backup LZ for extraction.
ESTATE_FAKE_DEATH_QUOTE: "To the last I grapple with thee; from hell's heart I stab at thee..." - Herman Melville
ESTATE_REMIND_PRONE_LINE1: You were killed by a landmine!
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DEADQUOTE_HINT2:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
You have to protect the DSM while the download is in progress. Use Claymores and Sentry Turrets.
ESTATE_DSM_DESTROYED_BY_DESERTION: The DSM was destroyed. Defend the objective.
ESTATE_OBJ_LZ: Get to the landing zone for extraction.
SO_DOWNLOAD_ARCADIA_DEADQUOTE_HINT4:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Setup defenses before you start downloading the files.
ESTATE_OBJ_DOWNLOAD: Protect the DSM until the transfer is complete.
ESTATE_OBJ_INTEL: Connect the DSM to Makarov's computer network.
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_DEADQUOTE_HINT1:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Infinite Ammo makes you a killing machine. Go all out!
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_OBJ_REGULAR: Destroy every vehicle on the bridge.
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_DEADQUOTE_HINT2:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Wreckage is activated for every 5 vehicles you destroy.
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_OBJ_HARDENED: Destroy every vehicle on the bridge.
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_DEADQUOTE_HINT4:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
The mission timer in Wreckage doesn't start immediately. Think about it.
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_OBJ_VETERAN: Destroy every vehicle on the bridge.
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_DEADQUOTE_HINT5:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Infinite Ammo doesn't reload your weapons. Avoid emptying your favorite weapons.
SO_DEMO_SO_BRIDGE_DEADQUOTE_HINT3:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Try to string Wreckages and keep Infinite Ammo the whole time.
SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_HARDENED: Using stealth, plant explosives on the targets.
SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_ESCAPE: Get clear of the compound for extraction.
SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_LEAVING_WHILE_IN: You are leaving without planting all the explosives.
SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_REGULAR: Using stealth, plant explosives on the targets.
SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_AA12_HELP:
OPERATIONAL INTEL
Your starting weapon, the silenced AA12 automatic shotgun is deadly in close quarters. But be careful of its wide spread and short range.
SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_OBJ_VETERAN: Using stealth, plant explosives on the targets.
SO_SABOTAGE_CLIFFHANGER_LEAVING_WHILE_IN: You have failed to plant all explosives.

SO_ESCAPE_AIRPORT_OBJ_VETERAN: Survive a series of ambushes and escape the airport.
SO_ESCAPE_AIRPORT_OBJ_REGULAR: Survive a series of ambushes and escape the airport.
SO_ASSAULT_OILRIG_OBJ_MAIN: Kill all enemies without harming the hostages
SO_JUGGERNAUTS_FAVELA_OBJ_REGULAR: Kill all 10 juggernauts using only explosives.
SO_JUGGERNAUTS_FAVELA_OBJ_EASY: Kill all 10 juggernauts using only explosives.
SO_JUGGERNAUTS_FAVELA_OBJ_VETERAN: Kill all 10 juggernauts using only explosives.
SO_JUGGERNAUTS_FAVELA_OBJ_HARDENED: Kill all 10 juggernauts using only explosives.
